overview: Allison Decker and Suzy Weston, known as infernal duo Bruiser & Crusher, used to rule the track dominating the roller derby world, until their relationship ended with Suzy's injury and Allison moving to New York. Years later, Suzy is the coach of the Los Angeles Pussy Posse and Allison has just reappeared, hoping Suzy will forgive her and let her return where everything started...
title: Talk Derby to Me
